post.title: libgen rename script
post.body:
```
​​​​​​​import sys
import os
import requests
import json
import hashlib
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup

with open(sys.argv[1],'rb') as file:
    fileMd5 = hashlib.md5()
    buf = file.read()
    fileMd5.update(buf)
basicInfoGetPara = {'md5': fileMd5.hexdigest()}
basicInfo = requests.get("http://gen.lib.rus.ec/book/index.php",params=basicInfoGetPara)
basicInfoSouped = BeautifulSoup(basicInfo.text, 'html.parser')
bookID = basicInfoSouped.body.table.contents[15].contents[3].string.lstrip('<tr>').rstrip('</tr>')
infoGetPara = {'ids': bookID, 'fields': 'ID,Title,Author,Year,Publisher,extension'}
libgenInfoInJSON = requests.get("http://gen.lib.rus.ec/json.php",params=infoGetPara)
libgenInfo = json.loads(libgenInfoInJSON.text.lstrip('[').rstrip(']'))
bookFileName = libgenInfo['author'] + ' - ' + libgenInfo['title'] + ' - ' + libgenInfo['publisher'] + ' (' + libgenInfo['year'] + ').' + libgenInfo['extension']
bookFileName = bookFileName.replace('\\','').replace('\/','').replace(':','').replace('*','').replace('"','').replace('<','').replace('>','').replace('|','')
os.rename(sys.argv[1],bookFileName)
```
